sentences.sContent: Her talent was not in gathering information but in analyzing and assessing—a meticulous organizer who plotted and planned with the cunning of a leopard.
sentences.sContent_eng: Her talent was not in gathering information but in analyzing and assessing—a meticulous organizer who plotted and planned with the cunning of a leopard.
sentences.sCn: 她的才华不在信息收集，而在于分析和评估，一个细微谨慎的组织者，策划着，盘算着有如美洲豹般的狡猾。

trans.tranOther: a large animal of the cat family, with yellow fur and black spots, which lives in Africa and South Asia
